title: [Large-Scale] Mathematics Learning Design for Cognitive Load Optimization and Mental Model Strengthening

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and understanding of elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Learners primarily access materials via smartphones in limited-technology environments, with project-based assessments measuring learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can identify core concepts of math problems with 80% accuracy using text clues.
Learners can construct mathematical mental models through summary scaffolding and apply them at least three times in project deliverables.
Learners can execute strategies to reduce cognitive load by 20% during the process of solving complex mathematical problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
